title.narrative: Civil Society Climate Change and Environment Fund

description.narrative: This activity (Civil Society Climate Change and Environment Fund) is a component of Accountability in Tanzania Programme (ACT) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £4,699,863. This component benefits Tanzania, and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society, Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, KPMG East Africa. The start date is 01-12-2011 and the end date is 30-11-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
